loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
Emiliana is a mother who since childhood has been attached to the breeding of animals being that she comes from a long line of farmers and breeders who passed down their knowledge to her, which now she is responsible for passing down to her 4 loving children. She is a very devoted wife and mother, and especially an exemplary daughter who, with extreme affection and patience, has been caring for her elderly parents for several years. Emiliana is a woman who knows how to manage her time well to dedicate plenty of attention and much love to her loving family and her animal breeding business. While this hard-working mother performs this activity, her husband Lucio works as a teacher, offering his knowledge with extreme dedication to the students of a humble educational center in the city of Cupi-Melgar. The greatest wish of these parents is to grant their children an education and security with the goal that they develop with great success.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Emiliana, es una madre que desde niña ha estado ligada a la crianza de animales, ya que proviene de una familia de agricultores y ganaderos que transmitieron en ella sus conocimientos y que ahora ella se encarga de brindarlos a sus 4 queridos hijos.E s madre y esposa muy consagrada, y sobre todo una hija ejemplar que desde hace varios años con sumo cariño y paciencia viene haciéndose cargo de sus ancianos padres. Emiliana es una mujer que sabe organizar muy bien su tiempo para dedicarles una buena atención y mucho amor a su querida familia y a su actividad ganadera.Mientras ésta laboriosa madre se dedica a esta labor su esposo Lucio trabaja como profesor brindando sus conocimientos con suma dedicación a los estudiantes de un humilde centro educativo de la ciudad de Cupi- Melgar.El anhelo más grande de estos padres otorgarles educación y seguridad a fin de que se desarrollen con sumo éxito.

loans.use: Purchase more balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use:
To harvest his land and grow more

Cosechar sus tierras y sembrar mas

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es:
Lucia is a humble and hard-working mother whose perseverance has led her to overcome many difficult times and financial hardships. She is a native of the Macará district, and for 20 years has lived in the city of Ayaviri. Along with all her family, she makes a living selling red meats and wool (sheep and alpaca). These activities, which they carry out as a team, generate good financial profits that allow her to cover the school expenses of her 4 loving children. This hard-working and dedicated family acquires their goods from the different communities of the city of Ayaviri. After acquiring a substantial amount, they ship it to be sold in the city of Cuzco. Now that they see its demand in the market, they are planning on acquiring a vehicle to speed up and facilitate their work. With that goal in mind, they turn to you to request a loan that will help them attain the wish housed in their hearts.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Lucia, es una humilde y hacendosa madre, su constancia la ha llevado a superar muchos momentos difíciles y de crisis económica, es natural del distrito de Macará, y hace 20 años radica en la ciudad de Ayaviri. Junto a toda su familia está dedicada a la comercialización de carnes rojas, lana de oveja y fibra de alpaca, estas actividades que desempeñan en equipo les viene generando muy buena rentabilidad económica y así cubrir los estudios superiores de sus 4 queridos hijos.Esta laboriosa y dedicada familia adquiere su mercadería en las diferentes comunidades de la ciudad de Ayaviri, luego de reunir una buena cantidad los despachan para su comercialización a la ciudad del Cuzco, ahora viendo la demanda del mercado tienen pensado adquirir una movilidad para agilizar y facilitar su trabajo, con ese fin recurren a ti para solicitarte un préstamo a fin de cumplir el anhelo que albergan en su corazón.

loans.use: Purchase a vehicle that will allow for faster transportation of their merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use:
Fertilizers and seeds for his land

Fertilizantes, abono y semillas para sus tierras

loans.name: Jilma

texts.es:
Jilma has always been a businesswoman. As her family grew, her expenses started increasing and her husband’s salary was insufficient to cover all of their demands. For that reason she decided to increase her income in innumerable ways so that the development of her loving children would not be limited. She currently makes a living selling American clothing, and buying and selling cheese. With these two activities, she tries to cover entirely the necessities in her home and the education of her 4 children. To accomplish this, she acquires her merchandise in bundles in the city of Puno then sells it in the little towns in the outskirts of the city. Because she is constantly traveling, she takes advantage of the delicious cheeses found in the towns and purchases them to sell in the cities of Juliaca and Puno. In doing this, Jilma has noticed the need to increase her capital, for which reason she wishes to obtain a loan with the goal of increasing her sales and her family’s quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Jilma, siempre fue una mujer de negocios, conforme llegaban más miembros a su hogar, sus gastos se fueron incrementando y el sueldo de su esposo era insuficiente para cubrir todas las demandas de su familia, es por ello que decidió de innumerables formas mejorar sus ingresos económicos para que así sus queridos hijos no limiten su desarrollo.Ella actualmente está dedicada al negocio de comercialización de ropa americana y de compra y venta de quesos, con estas dos actividades trata de suplir completamente las necesidades de su hogar y la educación de sus 4 hijos.Para este fin adquiere su mercadería por fardos en la ciudad de Puno, y los oferta en los diferentes pueblitos aledaños a su ciudad, como se encuentra en constante viaje aprovecha en adquirir deliciosos quesos de esos pueblitos para comercializarlos en las ciudades de Juliaca y Puno. En esta oportunidad Jilma ha observado la necesidad de aumentar el capital de su negocio, es por ello que desea obtener un préstamo a fin de incrementar sus ventas y la calidad de vida de su familia.

loans.use: Purchase capital to offer her products in greater quantities.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
In her small but cozy home, we find Maria tending very lovingly to little Jorge, her loving 6-year-old son. She is a very courageous and hard-working mother who, with much perseverance and determination, sells clothing and groceries in the Rinconada mine, which is located very far from Juliaca, the city she lives in. She has been in this business for 5 years, in which time she successfully managed to construct and renovate her house to offer her child a safe home of their own. To achieve this, she had to sacrifice many things. Among them, was leaving her small child in the care of her younger sister while she traveled for several days to sell her merchandise and earn her daily bread. Maria’s greatest wish is to be close to her son. For that reason, she is planning on increasing her merchandise inventory and start selling it in her native Juliaca. To achieve this, this self-sacrificing mother requests this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

En su pequeña pero acogedora vivienda encontramos a doña María atendiendo muy amorosamente a su querido hijo Jorgito de 6 años de edad, ella es una madre muy esforzada y hacendosa que con mucha constancia y empeño viene consagrándose a la comercialización de ropas y abarrotes en la mina Rinconada, lugar muy lejano de la ciudad donde radica Juliaca.Ya lleva dedicándose a este negocio 5 años, y en ese periodo logró construir y refaccionar su vivienda para ofrecerle un techo propio y seguro a su retoño. Para cumplir con su propósito tuvo que sacrificar muchas cosas, una de ellas es la de dejar a su pequeño hijo al cuidado de su hermana menor mientras viajaba durante muchos días a comercializar su mercadería y así lograr ganarse el pan de cada día.El deseo más grande de doña María es estar más cerca de su hijo y es por ello que tiene pensado aumentar su mercadería e iniciar su comercialización en su ciudad natal Juliaca y para concretar sus planes ésta abnegada madre solicita obtener un préstamo.

loans.use: Increase capital to begin selling her merchandise in the city she lives in to be close to her son.

loans.name: Nora

texts.es:
Since she was a little girl, Nora’s aspiration has been to succeed in life. Those plans were postponed for many months, however, with the arrival of her loving son being that she faced this responsibility on her own. Now that her son is older and does not require as much care and attention, she can effectively dedicate her time to her work. She sells clothing, and buys and sells CD’s. With these two activities she manages to maintain her loving family, which consists of her small son and her elderly parents, without economic restraint. Observing and analyzing the great demand for DVD’s and CD’s that exists in the market, she decided to do this work full-time because she believes that this activity will generate a higher income for her family. Your good heart will help this young mother achieve her goals in a very short time.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

La aspiración de Nora desde niña fue la de tener éxito en la vida, pero esos planes se postergaron durante muchos meses con la llegada de su querido hijo, puesto que se encontraba sola para enfrentar esta responsabilidad, ahora que su niño se encuentra grande y no necesita tantos cuidados y atenciones ya puede desenvolverse eficazmente en su trabajo. Comercializa prendas de vestir y compra y vende de CDs, con estas dos actividades está logrando mantener sin limitaciones económicas a su querida familia que la integran su pequeño niño y sus ancianos padres.Viendo y analizando la gran demanda de DVDs Y CDs que existe en el mercado decidió dedicarse íntegramente a este negocio, porque considera que con esta actividad podrá generar mayores ingresos económicos a su familia.Tu buen corazón permitirá que esta joven madre cumpla sus objetivos en corto tiempo.

loans.use: Increase capital to offer CD's and DVD's in greater quantities.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga is a self-sacrificing mother who is currently facing very difficult circumstances being that the youngest of her children suffers from a very rare illness that doctors have been unable to detect precisely. This situation has her very distressed because she is alone and does not count with her husband’s support. Seeing her child’s condition with much grief, and the immense love and affection she has for him, has been sufficient reason to make a stronger effort and try to save enough money to transfer him to another city where he can receive the necessary treatment and support. Olga’s loan request will be invested in her business of buying and selling used bicycles and tricycles. With this capital she will be able to obtain higher earnings, and in that way cover her most pressing need. Your good heart will allow this mother to look after her son’s well-being.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Olga es una abnegada madre que en estos momentos viene atravesando circunstancias muy difíciles en su vida, ya que el menor de sus hijos sufre de una enfermedad muy rara que los médicos no han podido detectar exactamente, este hecho la tiene muy acongojada porque se encuentra sola y no recibe el apoyo de su esposo, pero el observar su padecimiento con mucha pena y el inmenso amor y el cariño que siente por él es suficiente motivo para esforzarse mucho más y tratar de ahorrar lo suficiente para trasladarlo a otra ciudad donde pueda recibir el apoyo y tratamiento necesario.La solicitud que hace doña Olga servirá para invertirlos en su negocio de compra y venta de triciclos y bicicletas usadas, con este capital podrá obtener mayores ingresos y así cumplir con su más ansiado propósito.Tu buen corazón permitirá que ésta madre vele por el bienestar de su pequeño retoño.

loans.use: Increase capital to offer greater quantities of bicycles and tricycles.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha's dream has been to own a small home. Today, she works hard to carry out this goal to have a safe home to raise and protect her 3 lovely children. She is a very self-sacrificing mother whose life has been very hard because she lost her parents when she was a little girl and her 2 brothers in a tragic car accident. Since then at a young age, she has had responsibility for her younger brother. She worked numerous jobs as the breadwinner so she would not suffer from financial constraints imposed on providing for her brother's needs and education. Currently, her lovely brother is independent and has his own family while Martha is occupied taking care of her children. Martha has a small grocery store which is an indispensable means of family income. Her husband works as a cab driver for a transportation company in the city where they reside (Juliaca). Martha's wish is to repair her small store and increase her stock of merchandise. For this reason, she seeks a loan. Your generous hearts will allow Martha to accomplish her goals.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Translator.

El sueño de doña Martha ha sido el de tener una casita, hoy con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación está logrando llevar a cabo este anhelo con el propósito de tener una morada segura para cuidar y proteger a sus 3 queridos hijos. Ella es una madre muy abnegada a la que la vida golpeó muy duro, debido a que cuando aún era muy niña perdió a sus padres y a sus 2 hermanos en un trágico accidente de tránsito, desde entonces y a su corta edad se hizo cargo de su hermano menor.Se dedicó a innumerables actividades para tratar de ganarse el pan de cada día y así no padecer de limitaciones económicas y sobre todo suplir los gastos de educación de su hermano menor; actualmente su querido hermano ya es independiente y tiene su propia familia, mientras que Martha hace lo propio para sacar adelante a sus hijos.La señora Martha tiene una tiendita de abarrotes y es un ingreso indispensable para su familia, en tanto su esposo se desempeña como chofer en una empresa de transporte urbano de la ciudad donde radica, Juliaca.El deseo de Martha es refaccionar su pequeña tienda y aumentar el stock de su mercadería, con ese propósito solicita un préstamo.“Tu buen corazón permitirá cumplir los objetivos de doña Martha”.

loans.use: to fix her small store and buy merchandise in larger quantities to sell

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
Dionicia is a happy, persevering, and dedicated mother who works hard to keep up her home. Her immense motherly love motivates her to continue working to provide the best for her family, which is composed of her husband and 3 children. Since youth, she supported her loving parents in their work - selling livestock. Later, she married with ample experience of raising and selling livestock. Thus, she reasoned that she would continue to do the same work as her parents, which for many years, brought her good income. Despite her old age, Dionicia works with much enthusiasm like her husband, Juan, whose eagerness is his character. After many years, they have longed to build a dream home. Your indispensable support will allow Dionicia to materialize her dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Translator.

Dionicia, es una madre alegre, perseverante y muy dedicada a las labores de su hogar, su inmenso amor de madre la motiva a seguir trabajando y poner lo mejor de sí para sacar adelante a su familia integrada por su esposo y sus 3 hijos.Desde joven que tuvo uso de razón apoyó a sus queridos padres en su actividad de comercialización de ganado, luego de contraer matrimonio, con la amplia experiencia ya ganada en esta actividad decidió con mucha más razón dedicarse a esta noble labor de comercialización de ganado, que durante muchos años le viene generando buenos ingresos económicos.Pese a su avanzada edad doña Dionicia sigue desempeñándose con mucho ahínco, en tanto su esposo, Juan, con el empeño que lo caracteriza hace lo propio en su trabajo, y entre ambos después de muchos años están logrando construir su deseada casita. “Vuestro indispensable aporte permitirá concretar los sueños de Dionicia”

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish their dream home

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
In spite of the hardships she has gone through Hermelinda is trying to get ahead, aided by her her family's devotion and commitment. For many years this selfless mother earned a living making beautiful and distinctive garments. Everything was going well with her family life as well as with her work when a few months ago she suffered an unfortunate robbery. All of her tools where taken (sawing machines) as well as all of her merchandise. Since then she has been trying to cover the household expenses and schooling of her five children with her husband's income, which he obtains working as a motorcycle taxi driver. Unfortunately, it was not enough so Hermelinda decided to earn extra money offering telephony services for a fee to the people of Juliaca.

Her hope if to be able to go back to creating her beautiful garments but in order to do that she must to recover her sawing machines. It is with this hope that she comes to you requesting a loan. Hermelinda and her family anxiously await your response.

Translated from Spanish by Libertad Leal, Kiva volunteer.

Pese a los difíciles momentos que le tocó vivir doña Hermelinda está tratando de salir adelante con el compromiso y entrega de toda su familia.Ésta abnegada madre durante muchos años estaba dedicada a la confección de hermosas y distintivas prendas de vestir, todo marchaba bien en su vida familiar y laboral, desafortunadamente hace pocos meses sufrió un robo de sus herramientas de trabajo (máquinas de coser) y toda su mercadería, desde entonces sólo ha cubierto sus gastos familiares y la educación de sus 5 hijos con los ingresos que obtiene su esposo con su noble labor de moto taxista, pese a los esfuerzos esto no era suficiente y es así que doña Hermelinda decidió trabajar brindando el servicio de llamadas telefónicas a la población Juliaqueña.

El deseo de Hermelinda es volver a poner su creatividad y paciencia a cada una de sus confecciones, para ello requiere recuperar sus herramientas de trabajo, con ese fin recurre a tu buen corazón para solicitarte un préstamo.“Hermelinda y su familia esperan ansiosos por tu respuesta”

loans.use: Purchase of sawing machines

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
R. belongs to the Las Ucayalinas Community Bank group located at 13 Lt. 22 Miramar Mz. Street, in the district of Manantay in the department of Ucayali. She is 57 years old and the mother of 4 children. She is married and her husband is a laborer. With the first loan of 300 soles that she received from Manuela Ramos, she decided to purchase and sell personal and general merchandise.

Now she continues selling her merchandise as a street vendor in the different areas of the city. With the help of her children, she arrives very early to the locations where they will sell their items and during the nights, she takes care of her husband whose health is failing.

With this loan of 2500 soles ($900), which she will pay back in 4 months, she will buy cosmetics, hooks, deodorants, creams, batteries, mirrors, threads, needles, combs, etc.

In spite of her husband being sick, R. struggles every day to get ahead and is able to buy medicines for her husband and take care of her family. She is a very hard-working woman and is an example to follow.

Translated from Spanishy by Kim Baker, Kiva volunteer

La señora R. pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Ucayalinas, ubicado en la Calle Miramar Mz. 13 Lt. 22, del Distrito D. Manantay del Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 57 años es madre D. 4 hijos, es casada su esposo es obrero. R. con el primer préstamo recibido D. Manuela Ramos S/. 300 decidió invertirlo en la compra y venta D. pasamanería. En la actualidad continua vendiendo sus productos D. pasamanería en forma ambulatoria en los deferentes lugares D. la ciudad, con la ayuda D. sus hijos D. desplazan muy temprano a los sitios donD. venderán, y por las noches cuida a su esposo que esta delicado D. salud. Con este préstamo recibido D. S/. 2,500, el cual será pagado en 4 meses, lo invertirá en la compra D. cosméticos, carmines, ganchos, pilis, desodorantes, cremas, pilas, espejos, hilos, agujas, peines, etc. R. a pesar D. tener a su esposo delicado D. salud lucha cada día salir adelante y poder comprar las medicinas D. su esposo y dar bienestar a su familia es una mujer muy trabajadora y un ejemplo a seguir.

loans.use: To purchase more products to sell in her store

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca belongs to the Santa Bárbara Community Bank group and lives at Mz Z Lt. 15 in Asentamiento Humano Los Rosales. She sells her products in the Market #2, stand #11 in the district of Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She's 52 years old and is the mother of 6 children. She's separated from her husband.

In her stand in the market she sells natural products and medicines. Her stand is open from 8 am - 8 pm.

WIth this loan of 2000 soles, which she will pay back in 5 months, she will purchase more natural products such as: colognes, perfumes, floral baths, candles, medicinal herbs, etc. All of which to increase her business.

Blanca is very happy. Her business is growing and her sales are increasing. All of her strength and hard-work goes into giving the best to her children and having a better future.

Translated from Spanish by Kim Baker, Kiva volunteer.

La señora Blanca pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Bárbara, vive en el Asentamiento Humano. Los Rosales Mz Z Lt 15 y vende en el Mercado No 2 puesto No 11, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 52 años y es madre de 6 hijos, es separada En la actualidad ella cuenta con un puesto donde vende sus productos naturales y medicina natural, abre su puesto a las 8 am., y atiende hasta 8 pm. Con este préstamo de S/. 2,000 el cual será pagado en 5 meses, lo invertirá en la compra de productos naturales como: colonias, perfumes, baños de florecimiento, velas, hiervas medicinales, etc. Todo ello para incrementar su negocio. Blanca esta muy feliz, su negocio esta creciendo sus ventas aumentan y todo el esfuerzo que realiza es para darles lo mejor a sus hijos y tener un futuro mejor.

loans.use: Invest in the purchase of more products for her store

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela was raised to believe that the father of her children would support her and together, they would try to keep their family going. Unfortunately, everything was the opposite of what she was taught. Only she had to face the immense responsibility of working endless hours. Currently, she is a diligent and responsible mother who is dedicated to 2 businesses: she sells peeled potatoes and sweets in a mobile cart. These two activities had provided education to her 2 lovely children, who are currently students. She sees it necessary to increase her income - she wants to expand her sweets business. Graciela thinks that these changes will improve the quality of life for her family and provide further education for her children. Your generosity will allow this self-sacrificing mother to accomplish her goal.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Translator.

Graciela desde que formó su familia creyó que el padre de sus hijos la apoyaría y juntos tratarían de salir adelante, lamentablemente fue todo lo contrario, sola tuvo que enfrentar con tan grande responsabilidad y dedicarse horas interminables a sus actividades.Actualmente esta laboriosa y responsable madre está dedicada a 2 negocios, oferta papas peladas y golosinas en forma ambulatoria, con estas dos actividades tenía pensado brindarles su educación a sus 2 queridos hijos que se encuentran en etapa escolar, debido a la gran demanda de útiles se ve en la necesidad de aumentar sus ingresos económicos, para eso desea ampliar su negocio de venta de golosinas, Graciela considera que con estos cambios logrará mejorar su calidad de vida y la educación de sus pequeños.Tu Generosidad permitirá cumplir la meta de esta abnegada madre.

loans.use: to increase her income in order to offer cookies, caramel, soft drinks in greater quaitity

loans.name: Mary

texts.es:
Mary Luz is a very hardworking and humble woman. Her great love and devotion to her husband and son are the reason for her to keep her family going. She was able to set up her shoemaking business 6 years ago with her husband's initiative and agility and also with immense persistence and diligence. Her husband Simeon is currently handicapped due to a tragic car accident. Despite what happened, they have not been frightened nor discouraged. Currently, they persevere and fight to look for a better quality of life. Both make an effort at their small shoe business to provide work to 4 other young employees to later acquire large quantities of merchandise and distribute them wholesale to stores in the San Jose market in the city of Juliaca. Now, they would like to borrow a loan to buy raw materials like leather and patterns at wholesale. Then, they can create beautiful and novel shoes. Your support will give this exemplary couple the opportunity to advance in life.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Translator.

Mary Luz es una mujer muy trabajadora y humilde de corazón, su gran amor y entrega por su esposo e hijo la motivan lo suficiente para seguir adelante.Con mucho empeño y diligencia fue implementando su pequeña fábrica de calzados, negocio que emprendió hace 6 años gracias a la iniciativa y agilidad de su esposo, Simeón, quien actualmente es minusválido a causa de un trágico accidente de tránsito, a pesar de los sucedido no se amilanaron y actualmente con mucha más perseverancia y fuerza siguen luchando y buscan mejorar su calidad de vida.Ambos se esfuerzan y brindan trabajo a otros 4 jóvenes en su pequeña fábrica de calzados, luego de tener una buena cantidad de mercadería los distribuyen al por mayor en el mercado San José de la ciudad de Juliaca y en esta oportunidad recurren a ti para solicitarte un préstamo que tienen pensado invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de materia prima como: cuero y plantillas, para así seguir elaborando sus hermosos y novedosos calzados.Vuestro aporte le dará la oportunidad de salir adelante a esta ejemplar pareja.

loans.use: to buy raw materials at wholesale

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
The beautiful designs of handmade sweaters demonstrate a skill that not everyone possesses. To be such a craftsman, one needs much patience, creativity, and above all, skill. Miriam is a young mother (19 years old) and learned the craft from her lovely mother, whose diligence was infused into knowledge. Now, her mother has managed to make her work the most important source of family income. Miriam is the youngest of 5 siblings. She lost her father when she was very young. Since then, her humble, loving, and brave mother educated all her children and kept her entire family going. Currently, Miriam is already a mother of a young boy, Maycol, who is loved by his family. She is occupied with the same courage and good values that her mother instilled in her. Miriam and her mother wish to buy raw material (varieties of wool) to be able to knit beautiful gloves, hats, and berets. Your generous hearts will allow this family to continue harvest their children's dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Translator.

La elaboración de hermosas prendas a mano es una destreza que no todas las personas poseen, por ser una labor que necesita de mucha paciencia, creatividad y sobre todo habilidad. Miriam es una joven madre de 19 años que no es aneja a esta labor, ya que aprendió este oficio de su querida madre, quien con mucha diligencia inculcó sus conocimientos y que ahora ha convertido este oficio en el más importante ingreso económico familiar.Miriam es la menor de 5 hermanos, perdió a su padre cuando aún era muy niña, desde entonces su humilde, querida y valerosa madre los ha educado y sacado adelante. Actualmente Miriam ya es madre de Maycol niño muy tierno y querido dentro de su familia, con el mismo coraje y buenos valores que su madre inculcó en ella se viene desempeñando.El deseo de Miriam y su madre es comprar materia prima (variedad de lana) para seguir tejiendo sus hermosos guantes, chullos y boinas, Tu buen corazón permitirá que esta familia siga cosechando los sueños de sus hijos.

loans.use: to buy raw material in bulk

loans.name: Laura Manuelita

texts.es:
Laura belongs to the Santa Bárbara Community Bank group, located at #121 Psj. Mariano Cárdenas, in the district of Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is 59 and is the mother of 3 children. Her husband is a salesperson. With the first loan of 300 soles that she received from Manuela Ramos, she invested in the sales of furniture.

Now she has a furniture store which opens at 7 am. She works there with the help of her children until 9 at night, carrying out the duties of running the store.

With this loan of 3000 soles, which she will pay back in 5 months, she be able to purchase furniture, tables, beds, desks, pantries, varnish, laquer, etc.

Laura is very happy. Her business is growing and her sales are increasing. All of her strength and hard-work is for the investment in the education of her children, so she can proviD. them with a better future, thanks to her job.

Translated from Spanish by Kim Baker, Kiva volunteer.

La señora Laura pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Bárbara, ubicado en el Psj. Mariano Cárdenas No 121, del Distrito D. Calleria del Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 59 años y es madre D. 3 hijos, su esposo es comerciante. Con el primer préstamo recibido D. Manuela Ramos D. S/. 300 deciD. invertirlo en la venta D. muebles. En la actualidad ella cuenta con una tienda D. venta D. muebles, para lo cual abre su negocio a las 7 am., y lo atienD. hasta 9 pm, junto con el apoyo D. sus hijos sacan adelante el negocio. Con este préstamo D. S/. 3000 el cual será pagado en 5 meses, lo invertirá en la compra D. muebles, mesas, camas, escritorios, reposteros, triplays, barniz, laca, etc. Laura esta muy feliz, su negocio esta creciendo sus ventas aumentan y todo el esfuerzo que realiza es para invertir en la educación D. sus hijos y así poder ofrecerles un mejor futuro gracias a su trabajo.

loans.use: To purchase more furniture to sell

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es:
Alfonso and Gladis are a young couple with countless plans for their future. Alfonso decided to live in the city of Juliaca to work as an artist and in his free time, to work in a service oriented role on his tricycle to save up money for their big dream. While Alfonso works hard daily in his activities, his young wife does agricultural work and takes care of their young son, Edison. Both of them would like to start a farm to raise hens and guinea pigs. They are certain that this activity will increase their income and allow them to provide a better quality of life for their son. To materialize their plans, Alfonso seeks your generosity to obtain a loan that he promises to repay in 6 months.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Translator.

Alfonso y Gladis son una pareja de esposos muy jóvenes con innumerables planes para su vida futura, Alfonso decidió radicar en la ciudad de Juliaca para trabajar como maestro de obras y en sus horas libres brindar servicio de movilidad en su triciclo, con la finalidad de ahorrar lo suficiente y cumplir el gran sueño que tiene con su fiel esposa. Mientras Alfonso se esfuerza en sus actividades cotidianas su joven esposa se dedica a la agricultura y al cuidado de su pequeño niño, Edison, el deseo de ambos es lograr implementar su granja de gallinas y cuyes, están seguros de que incursionando en esta actividad aumentarán sus ingresos económicos y les permitirá ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su pequeño niño.Para concretar sus planes Alfonso recurre a tu generoso corazón para solicitarte un préstamo de dinero que promete rembolsarlo en un lapso de 6 meses.

loans.use: to start a farm to raise chicken and guinea pigs

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
This is Edith, an enterprising young woman of 22. At her young age she is responsible for an ice cream parlour, a family business established by her parents many years ago. With this business they were able to educate their dear children, who are now on the verge of becoming professionals. Edith is the youngest of 5 brothers and sisters. Her parents, on seeing her interest and how responsible she was, decided to leave her in charge of the family business.

She is making a go of the business with hard work and dedication and enjoying the fruits of what her parents started. This enterprising and exemplary young woman offered work to 2 of her cousins, who make a perfect team for this business. They all work daily from 8:00 in the morning until 10:00 at night. They would like to turn this ice cream parlour into one of the biggest distributors in the city of Juliaca. With this goal, they try hard to give the best of themselves, seeing an opportunity in the market demand. Edith now finds that she needs to buy another ice cream blender and for this, she turns to you. Your important support will help this young, enterprising young woman solidify her dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva volunteer.

Ella es Edith, joven emprendedora de 22 años. A su corta edad es responsable de la heladería, negocio familiar que establecieron sus padres desde hace ya varios años, con esta labor es que lograron educar a sus queridos hijos que ahora se encuentran a puertas de ser profesionales.Edith es la menor de 5 hermanos, sus padres al ver el interés y responsabilidad que ponía en su actividad decidieron dejarle el negocio familiar.

Actualmente con mucho empeño y dedicación viene sacando adelante y disfrutando las cosechas que un día sus padres sembraron; ésta emprendedora y ejemplar muchacha ofrece trabajo a 2 de sus primos, quienes forman un equipo perfecto para este negocio, todos trabajan diariamente desde las 8:00 de la mañana hasta las 10:00 de la noche, desean convertir esta heladería en una de las distribuidoras más grandes de la ciudad de Juliaca, con ese fin se esfuerzan y ponen lo mejor de sí, en esta oportunidad viendo la demanda del mercado Edith se ve en la necesidad de comprar otra licuadora para helados, con ese propósito recurre a ti.Tu importante aporte permitirá concretar los sueños de ésta joven emprendedora.

loans.use: Buy a blender for making ice cream.

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es:
In her precarious but very welcoming home we find Concepción, 31 years old and the mother of 2 charming boys. Her great spirit, strong will and hard work have allowed her to improve her quality of life and that of her family. For the past 11 years, this persevering woman has been working very hard in a bakery, and on the weekends buys and sells pigs. With these two activities she has been able to raise her offspring,

She is trying to increase her capital in order to obtain greater income. They currently live at her mother-in-law's home. Her wish is to buy land and build her own dwelling, a place where she dreams that her children will live under her care and with the security that they deserve. With that goal. she will keep working tirelessly.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva volunteer.

En su precaria pero muy acogedora vivienda encontramos a la señora Concepción de 31 años de edad, ella es madre de 2 encantadores niños, su gran espíritu, voluntad y empeño le han permitido mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia, ésta perseverante mujer desde hace 11 años viene trabajando arduamente en una panadería, y los fines de semana se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos, con estas dos actividades esta logrando sacar adelante a sus retoños.

Pretende aumentar su capital para obtener mayores ingresos económicos.Actualmente viven en el domicilio de su suegra, el deseo que tienen es comprar un terreno y construir su propia morada, lugar donde anhela que sus hijos vivan bajo el cuidado y seguridad que se merecen, con ese propósito sigue trabajando insistentemente en su labor.

loans.use: Buy a larger quantity of pigs to sell, so that she can buy land and and build a small house.

loans.name: Santos Domingo

texts.es:
Mr. Santos is a very happy and sociable 52-year-old man. He says he is a happily married man with a hard-working woman who has supported him in achieving all of his dreams. They have 6 children and they would have liked to have more. Five of them work and one studies. The Santos family is one that loves working and agriculture. The whole family works together to harvest an area of Pineapple, and one of coffee and bananas. It has been 28 years since Mr. Santos began working the land he loves so much. His wife sells the products that harvest and buys other products from producing neighbors so she can sell them at the Oriental market, one of the largest in the capital. Mr. Santos also earns some extra income by transporting products from other producers from the fields to the markets using his truck. Mr. Santos is requesting a loan to acquire agricultural supplies which are necessary to maintain the crops. His dream is that his children inherit the love to work the land that with great effort he and his wife acquired, and that some day their children will inherit.

Translated from Spanish by Antonella Sacconi, Kiva Volunteer.

Don Santos es un hombre alegre y muy sociable de 52 años de edad, dice que es un hombre felizmente casado con una mujer trabajadora que lo ha apoyado en todos sus sueños, tienen 6 hijos y hubiera querido tener mas, 5 de ellos trabajan y 1 estudian aun, son familia de amor al trabajo y la agricultura. Todos apoyan en el trabajo de cultivo de 1 manzana de Piña 1 manzana de café y 1 manzana de plátano, tiene 28 años trabajando la tierra que tanto ama. Su esposa comercializa lo que ellos producen y compran a otros vecinos productores para vender en el mercado Oriental, uno de los mas grandes de la capital. También tienen una camioneta de tina que él maneja y trabaja haciendo viajes a otros productores y gana por cada viaje del campo a los mercados en donde los comercializan. Este señor solicita el crédito para insumos agrícolas que son necesarios para el debido mantenimiento de la cosecha. Su sueño es que sus hijos hereden el amor al trabajo a la tierra que con gran esfuerzo adquirieron sus padres y algún día heredaran con amor.

loans.use: To Purchase Agricultural Supplies

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina is very popular and much loved at the Cerro Colorado market in the city of Juliaca, where she has a small stand for selling groceries. This hard-working and humble mother looked for countless ways to proviD. all the necessities to her family so that her 7 dear children do not suffer deprivations and receive a good education.

She has been in this business for 26 years, starting off with a small amount of merchandise in a not very good location. But little by ilttle her business has grown and she has increased the variety of products. Thanks to the kindness with which she attends to her customers and her good service, she has been able to achieve a loyal clientele, and every day her income increases. With her noble work and that of her husband, she will have the fortune of seeing her children become professionals soon.

Cristina´s wish is to expand her sales stand, and she thinks that making these improvements will give greater comfort to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva volunteer.

Doña Cristina, es muy popular y querida dentro del mercado Cerro Colorado D. la ciudad D. Juliaca en donD. posee un pequeño puesto D. venta D. abarrotes, esta emprendedora y humilD. madre buscó innumerables formas D. proporcionar todo lo necesario a su familia para que sus 7 queridos hijos no pasen limitaciones económicas y reciban una buena educación.

Viene dedicándose a este negocio 26 años, inició con poca mercadería y en un lugar no muy apropiado, pero poco a poco ha venido creciendo D. tamaño y ha incrementado la variedad D. productos, gracias a la amabilidad con la que atienD. y al excelente servicio que ofrece ya logró tener asiduos clientes, y día a día va incrementando mucho más sus ingresos económicos, con su noble labor y el trabajo D. su esposo tendrá la dicha dentro D. muy poco tiempo observarlos convertidos en excelentes profesionales.

El deseo D. doña Cristina es ampliar su puesto D. ventas, considera que haciendo estas modificaciones brindará mayor comodidad a sus clientes.

loans.use: Expand space for selling groceries.

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
Señora Doris belongs to the community bank Santa Bárbara, located at No 738 Jr Sucre, of the district of Calleria in the province of Ucayali. She is 45 years old and a mother of two children. With the first loan received through Manuela Ramos for 300 Soles, Doris decided to invest it in a business selling furniture.

Presently, she has a furniture sales business for which she wakes up very early to open, and at nights she is dedicated to her children.

With this loan of 3000 Soles, which will be paid back in five months, she will invest it in purchasing wood, bolts, lacquer, wood putty, furniture, etc.

Doris is very happy: her business is beginning to gain bigger clients, her profits are increasing, and all the effort that she makes is for the purpose of investing in the education of her kids and in this way be able to offer them a better future thanks to her work.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

La señora Doris pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Bárbara, ubicado en el Jr Sucre No 738, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 45 años y es madre de 2 hijos. Doris. Con el préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos S/. 300 decide invertirlo en un negocio de venta de muebles.

En la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de venta de muebles para lo cual se levanta muy temprano para abrir su negocio, y en las noches se dedica a sus hijos.

Con este préstamo de S/. 3000 el cual será pagado en 5 meses, lo invertirá en la compra de madera, pernos, tiner, laca, masillas, muebles, etc.

Doris esta muy feliz, su negocio esta empezando a captar mayores clientes, sus ingresos aumentan y todo el esfuerzo que realiza es para invertir en la educación de sus hijos y así poder ofrecerles un mejor futuro gracias a su trabajo.

loans.use: wood, bolts, finishing coats, etc

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
On one of the busiest streets in the city of Juliaca we can find Julia's internet booths. She is a young, 21-year-old mother who, together with her husband Ronal, and with much effort and sacrifice, was able to put in the internet booths at her father´s home about 1 year ago. They both always try their best to offer their customers a good and comfortable service.

Now, after observing the needs of their clients, they are thinking of fixing up an area for a phone booth, where they will offer telephone service to their neighbors who do not have phone lines in their homes. The wish of this young couple is to be able to reach their goal shortly, with your help.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva volunteer.

En una de las calles más concurridas de la ciudad de Juliaca ubicamos las cabinas de Internet de Julia, joven madre de 21 años de edad, quien junto a su esposo, Ronal, con mucho empeño y sacrificio hace aproximadamente 1 año lograron instaurar cabinas de Internet en el domicilio de su padre. Ambos en todo momento tratan de poner lo mejor de sí para ofrecerles un buen y cómodo servicio a sus clientes.

Ahora observando la necesidad y bienestar de sus clientes tienen pensado adecuar un espacio de su local para abrir e implementar un locutorio en el que también pretenden ofrecer servicios de recepción de llamadas a sus vecinos que no cuentan con una línea telefónica en casa.El deseo de esta joven pareja podrá concretarse en corto tiempo con tu apoyo.

loans.use: Install a phone booth for making both local and long distance calls.

loans.name: Delia Luz

texts.es:
Señora Delia belongs to the community bank Santa Bárbara, located in the jewelry section of Market No. 2, of the district of Calleria in the province of Ucayali. She is 42 years old and a mother of two children. Her husband is employed by Essalud, but the income that he has does not meet the family's economic needs. With the first loan that she received through Manuela Ramos for 300 Soles, she decided to invest it in the sales of fine jewelries.

Presently she has a position where she sells jewelry. She opens her stand very early in the morning and serves there until four in the afternoon. After that she is dedicated to her house and the care of her children.

With this loan of 3000 Soles, which she will pay back in five months, she will invest in buying jewels, earrings, rings, necklaces, bracelets, watches, etc. Delia is very content working in her business since she can offer economic wellbeing to her family.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

La señora Delia pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Bárbara, ubicado en el Mercado No 2 Sección joyería, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 42 años y es madre de 2 hijos, su esposo es empleado de Essalud, pero los ingresos económicos que tiene no le alcanzan para su economía familiar, Con el primer préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos S/. 300 decide invertirlo en la venta de fantasías finas.

En la actualidad ella cuenta con un puesto donde vende sus joyas, abre su puesto muy temprano y atiende hasta 4 pm, luego se dedica a su hogar y cuidado de sus hijos.

Con este préstamo de S/. 3,000 el cual será pagado en 5 meses, invertirá en la compra de joyas, aretes, anillos, pendientes para mujeres, cadenas, esclavas, relojes, etc. Delia esta muy contenta trabajando en su negocio le puede brindar el bienestar económico a su familia.

loans.use: purchase more products to sell in her business

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
Doris is 32 years old and a native of the village of Capachica. When her children started to shcool, she and her husband decided to relocate to the city of Juliaca, so that their little ones could receive a better education and a better quality of life.

A few years after relocating to the city, her husband passed away, leaving her alone to take care of her two young children. Since then, she has been both mother and father to her offspring, working very hard and tirelessly in various activities to earn a living so that her little ones would not suffer deprivations. After many years of effort , she finally, with the help of her brothers, was able to start up a funeral service for the local population in Juliaca. For this purpose, they rented a space near the hospital, so as to be able to offer an appropriate service to people who were going through very difficult circumstances due to the loss of a loved one.

Doris´s wish is to fix up her premises, and for this she turns to you to ask for a loan to carry out her plan.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva volunteer.

Doris de 32 años de edad, es natural del pueblito de Capachica, desde que sus niños se encontraban en etapa escolar decidieron junto a su esposo radicar en la ciudad de Juliaca, con el fin de que sus pequeños reciban una mejor educación y calidad de vida.

A los pocos años de radicar en dicha ciudad su abnegado esposo falleció, dejándola sola a cargo de sus 2 menores hijos, desde entonces se convirtió en padre y madre de sus retoños, trabajando ardua e incansablemente en diversas actividades para ganarse el pan de cada día y así sus pequeños no puedan pasar limitaciones económicas.Tras muchos años de esfuerzo y empeño finalmente con apoyo de sus hermanos decidió instaurar un espacio para brindar servicios funerarios a la población Juliaqueña, para esto alquilaron un local cerca del Hospital, con la finalidad de brindarle un apropiado servicio a la población que atraviesa circunstancias muy difíciles por la pérdida de un ser querido.

El deseo de Doris es implementar su local, con ese fin recurre a ti para solicitarte un préstamo para llevar a cabo su propósito.

loans.use: Invest in improvements to her selling space.

loans.name: Lorgia

texts.es:
Señora Lorgia belongs to the community bank Santa Bárbara, located in the food section of Market No. 2, of the district of Calleria in the province of Ucayali. She is 43 years old and a mother of five children. Her husband is a construction worker, but the income that he has does not meet the family's needs to sustain themselves. With her first loan received through Manueal Ramos of 300 Soles, she decided to invest in food sales.

Presently she has a food sales position. She wakes up very early to prepare her foods and focuses on opening up her business in the morning, once finished her daily duty she prepares herself for tomorrow's work day.

With this loan of 1500 Soles, which she will pay back in five months, she will invest it in purchasing supplies for preparing her dishes like: rice, sugar, milk, condiments, chicken, stews, vegetables, etc.

Lorgia is very happy: her business is growing, her family feels very proud of her for her achievements, and now she is able to give the best to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

La señora Lorgia pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Bárbara, ubicado en el Mercado No 2 Sección comidas, del Distrito D. Calleria del Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 43 años y es madre D. 5 hijos, su esposo es albañil, pero los ingresos económicos que tiene no le alcanzan para el sustento familiar. Con el primer préstamo recibido D. Manuela Ramos S/. 300 deciD. invertirlo en la venta D. comida.

En la actualidad ella cuenta con un puesto D. venta D. comida, se levanta muy temprano para preparar sus comidas y dirigirse a abrir su negocio, una vez terminado su faena diaria se prepara para la jornada del día siguiente.

Con este préstamo D. S/. 1,500 el cual será pagado en 5 meses, lo invetira en la compra D. víveres para preparar sus comidas como: arroz azúcar, leche, condimentos, pollos, menestras, verduras, etc.

Lorgia esta muy feliz, su negocio esta creciendo, su familia se siente muy orgullosa D. ella por sus logros y ahora pueD. darles lo mejor a sus hijos.

loans.use: products for the preparation of her foods

loans.name: Emelina

texts.es:
Ms. Emelina belongs to the Santa Bárbara Communal Bank, located at Pasaje Mariano Cárdenas No 175, in the Calleria district of the Ucayali region. She is 49 years old and mother of 4 children. Her husband is a public employee. With the first loan obtained from Manuela Ramos of S/. 300, she invested in the food sales business.

She presently sells food at home. She prepares her meals early in the day and sells them starting at noon. In the afternoon, she is devoted to her children.

With the requested loan of S/.1000, to be repaid in five months, she will invest in the purchase of ingredients, such as rice, sugar, noodles, beans, potatoes, spices, milk, eggs, meat, etc.

Emelina is very happy, as her business is growing and her clients are more and more numerous, due to the good taste of her dishes. Her sales have increased. All of her efforts are directed at investing in the education of her children and, in the future, opening a restaurant.

Translated from Spanish by Leticia Britos, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Emelina pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Bárbara, ubicado en el Pasaje Mariano Cárdenas No 175, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 49 años y es madre de 4 hijos. Su esposo es empleado público. Con el primer préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300 decide invertir en la venta de comida.

En la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de venta de comida en su casa. Prepara sus comidas desde muy temprano y las vende a partir del medio día, mientras que en las tardes se dedica a sus hijos.

Con este préstamo de S/. 1000, el cual será pagado en 5 meses, invertirá en la compra de víveres como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, frijoles, papas, condimentos, leche, huevos, carnes, etc.

Emelina está muy feliz, ya que su negocio está creciendo y sus clientes son cada vez más numerosos, por la buena sazón que tiene. Sus ventas han aumentado y todo el esfuerzo que realiza es para invertir en la educación de sus hijos y más adelante poder poner un restaurante.

loans.use: Purchase of ingredients for the elaboration of food.

loans.name: Maura Cecilia

texts.es:
Ms. Maura belongs to the Santa Bárbara Communal Bank, located at Mercado No 2 Sección Joyería, in the Calleria district of the Ucayali region. She is 84 years old and mother of 15 children. Her husband is retired. With the first loan obtained from Manuela Ramos of S/. 300, she invested in the purchase of fine bijouterie.

She is presently selling jewelry, working at her stand from very early in the morning, while in the afternoon she spends time with her family.

With the requested loan of S/.3000, to be repaid in five months, she will buy jewelry, earrings, rings, pendants, necklaces, bracelets, watches, etc.

Marla is a great example for women, as her age does not prevent her from working. Family is her motivation to go on.

Translated from Spanish by Leticia Britos, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Maura pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Bárbara, ubicado en el Mercado No 2 Sección Joyería, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 84 años y es madre de 15 hijos. Su esposo es jubilado. Con el primer préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300 invirtió en la compra de fantasías finas.

En la actualidad ella cuenta con un puesto de venta de joyas, abriendo su negocio muy temprano, mientras que por las tardes comparte su tiempo con su familia.

Con este préstamo de S/. 3000, el cual será pagado en 5 meses, comprará joyas, aretes, anillos, pendientes para mujeres, cadenas, esclavas, relojes, etc.

Maura es un gran ejemplo de mujer, su edad no es impedimento para seguir trabajando y su familia es su impulso para seguir adelante.

loans.use: Purchase of jewelry products to stock her business.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Ms. María belongs to the Santa Bárbara Communal Bank, located at Pasaje Mariano Cárdenas N° 135, in the Calleria district of the Ucayali region. She is 39 years old and mother of three children. Her husband, a musician, lost his right leg in an accident. She invested the first loan obtained from Manuela Ramos -of S/. 300- in building rooms to be rented.

She presently runs a room rental business, and rents sound equipment as well. In conjunction to tending to her tenants, when her equipment is rented, she takes care of it herself.

With this loan of S/. 3000, to be repaid in five months, she will invest in the purchase of wood, corrugated iron, nails, paint, an electric organ, etc.

María is very happy. In spite of her husband’s difficulties to walk, they are both able to work. Her business is starting to attract more clients and her income is growing. All of her efforts are directed at having a better future next to her loved ones.

Translated from Spanish by Leticia Britos, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora María pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Bárbara, ubicado en el Pasaje Mariano Cárdenas N° 135, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 39 años y es madre de 3 hijos. Su esposo, que es músico, perdió su pierna derecha en un accidente. El primer préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300 decidió invertirlo en la construcción de cuartos para alquilar.

En la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de alquiler de cuartos, asi como alquiler de equipos de sonido. Realiza sus labores en conjunto con la atención de sus inquilinos, y cuando sus equipos son requeridos, ella misma se ocupa de eso.

Con este préstamo de S/. 3000, el cual será pagado en 5 meses, invertirá en la compra de madera, calaminas, clavos, pintura, un órgano eléctrico, etc.

María está muy feliz. Pese a que su esposo tiene dificultades para caminar, esto no es impedimento para que ambos trabajen. Su negocio está empezando a captar mayores clientes, sus ingresos aumentan y todo el esfuerzo que realiza es para tener un futuro mejor a lado de sus seres más queridos.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials and an electric organ.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
Mrs Cecilia A. V. in a lady who has been working hard in her job which has shown great rewards thanks to her efforts. She dedicates her time and efforts to the grocery store business which is located within her home in Cinco Pinos in Chinandega. She is married, with the responsibility of looking after her two children, looking for ways to provide them with good education, health and a comfortable place to live.

One of the greatest problems which Cecilia faces at the moment is the urgent need to obtain economic support to buy stock. This is why she has come to Ceprodel for financial assistance, which in turn will allow her to buy produce which she can sell in her grocery store. It is important to point out that thanks to the sales in her store, her children benefit, as she is able to pay for their studies and provide them with the things they need.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

La señora Cecilia A. V. es una mujer que ha venido desempeñando buena labor en su trabajo lo cual le ha dado buenos resultados gracias a sus esfuerzos que dedica al negocio de pulpería que tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación en el municipio de Cinco Pinos de la ciudad de Chinandega. Es madre casada y con la responsabilidad de dos hijos a su cargo que busca la manera de brindarles educación, salud y un techo digno donde vivir.

Una de las grandes necesidades que hoy en día atraviesa la señora Cecilia es la urgencia de obtener recursos económicos para la compra de su mercadería, es por tal motivo que acude a Ceprodel para obtener el crédito y de esta manera adquirir los productos para ofrecerlos en la pulpería a todos sus clientes. Es necesario destacar que por medio de sus ventas en la pulpería, sus hijos son beneficiados ya que ella logra pagar sus estudios y suplir sus necesidades.

loans.use: To supply her grocery store with produce

loans.name: Janeth Del Socorro

texts.es:
Mrs Janeth del Socorro A. Jarquín in a single woman, with no children, but with the responsibility of helping economically with the studies of her young nephew and look after her mother. For 5 years she has been committed to her local grocey store business in Cinco Pinos in Chinandega, Nicaragua which is where she lives these days.

Since she started her business she has been working hard to succeed in looking afte her home which she shares with her mother and small nephew, who is of school-age. Something which is currently a problem is that she does not have money to buy the products to supply her business and this is why she has come to Ceprodel for financial support in the form of loans in order that she can obtain stock which will allow her to improve her business and support her humble family unit.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

La señora Janeth del Socorro A. J. es una dama soltera sin hijos pero con la responsabilidad de ayudar económicamente en los estudios a su pequeño sobrino y a velar por la salud y el cuido de su madre. Desde hace 5 años se ha dedicado al negocio de pulpería en el municipio de Cinco Pinos departamento de Chinandega en Nicaragua que es el lugar donde reside hoy en día.

Desde que ella inició en este negocio ha venido esforzándose grandemente para lograr mantener su hogar compuesto por su madre y un pequeño sobrino en edad escolar. Una de las necesidades que actualmente le está perjudicando es que no posee dinero para la compra de productos para abastecer su negocio y es por eso que ha acudido a Ceprodel para obtener financiamiento por medio de préstamos para poder adquirir la mercadería que le permitirá mejorar su negocio y por ende mantener su humilde nucleo familiar.

loans.use: To purchase stock for her grocery store

loans.name: Margarita Del Rosari

texts.es:
Mrs Margarita A. B. is a young mother who comes from Cinco Pinos in the Chinandega Department. For five years she has worked in a community education institute selling food such as biscuits, churritos embolsados, sweets and soft drinks.

It must be pointed out that Mrs A. is a good example, given that despite her sad economic crisis she has been successful in lookng after the needs of her young daughter who today, more than ever, needs the care and protection of her mother, as she is so young.

In order to carry out her food sales, Mrs A. needs to purchase raw materials to make her products. This is why she is seeking support from Ceprodel with the aim of obtaining economic resources which will allow her to purchase produce and continue to provide for her family.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

La señora Margarita A. B. es una joven madre originaria del municipio de Cinco Pinos del departamento de Chinandega. Ha trabajado desde hace 5 años en un instituto escolar de la comunidad vendiendo comestibles como galletas, churritos embolsados, caramelos y refrescos.

Es de mucho necesidad destacar que la señora A. es digna de imitar por el hecho de que a pesar de su lamentable crisis económica ha logrado suplir la necesidad de su pequeña hija que hoy mas que nunca necesita del cuido y la protección de su madre por ser de muy corta edad.

Para llevar a cabo sus ventas de comestibles, la señora A. necesita adquirir su materia prima para preparar los productos. Es por este motivo que busca apoyo en Ceprodel con el fin de adquirir recursos económicos que le permitan comprar sus productos y de esta manera continuar manteniendo su hogar.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials to create her food products

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị Sự is 35 years old. Her husband 37. They have 4 school age children and live in Hưng Nguyên, Nghệ An. She’s been with the TYM Fund 5 years now. She takes out loans to finance her livestock and learns how to manage her money from the fund. The result is her family’s fine economy. The monthly income is 170-200USD. She would like to apply for a loan of 525USD to buy young cows.

Translated from Vietnamese by ngungo, Kiva volunteer.


Chị Nguyễn Thị Sự năm nay 35 còn chồng chị 37 tuổi. Anh chị có 4 người con đang trong độ tuổi đi học. Họ đang sống tại Hưng Nguyên, Nghệ An. Cho đến nay chị Sự đã tham gia Quỹ được 4 năm. Vốn vay được chị sử dụng chủ yếu cho việc chăn nuôi. Sau khi vào Quỹ không những có thêm vốn làm ăn, chị Sự còn học được cách tiết kiệm, chi tiêu hợp lý. Luôn sử dụng vốn đúng mục đích nên hiệu quả kinh tế mang lại rất tốt. Thu nhập hàng tháng của gia đình chị Sự khoảng 170-200USD. Vòng vốn này chị xin vay 525USD để mua bò.

loans.use: Buy young cows

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es:
Mr Marvin Vaellecillo L. is a vey hardworking individial, dedicated to his business of selling clothes, which he does travelling on his bike through the street of Cinos Pinos in the Chinandega department.

His work started three years ago travelling to different places selling trousers and shirt in all sizes and styles. According to Marvin, his hard work is all to maintain his home, given that he has two children in primary education, who need their father's full support.

Mr V. currently needs to purchase more clothing whch he can then market and sell. This is why he is wisely asking for a locan from Ceprodel to acquire stock and then sell it through his travelling business in the streets of Cinco Pinos, as per usual on his bike.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

El señor Marvin V. L. es una persona que se destaca por ser muy trabajador dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa vendiendo ambulante en su bicicleta en las calles del municipio de Cinco Pinos del departamento de Chinandega.

Su labor la inicia desde hace tres años movilizándose por todos los lugares ofreciendo pantalones y camisas de toda talla y de diferentes estilos. Según comenta, sus grandes esfuerzos se deben exclusivamente para la manutención de su hogar ya que tiene dos hijos que estudian en primaria y por tal razón merecen todo el respaldo de su padre.

La necesidad que actualmente atraviesa el señor V. es la adquisición de la ropa para comercializarla. Por esta razón muy sabiamente solicita crédito en Ceprodel para adquirir la mercadería y luego venderla ambulantemente en las calles de Cinco Pinos como acostumbra hacer en su bicicleta.

loans.use: To purchase clothing to market and sell

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị Tình, 43 years old, lives with her husband and 4 children in Hưng Nguyên, Nghệ An. Three of the children are still in school so the education budget is quite a concern. She farms rice, raises livestock and sells grocery, vegetable items at the open market for living. She uses half of the funds from the loan to buy young pigs and cows, the other half to invest in her grocery stand. The steady income from the grocery stand is used to make payments; income from selling livestock to finance her children’s education and buy major household items. The family’s economy improves every year. She is applying for a loan of 575USD.

Translated from Vietnamese by ngungo, Kiva volunteer.


Chị Nguyễn Thị Tình, 43 tuổi, sống tại Hưng Nguyên, Nghệ An cùng chồng và 4 con. Trong số con của chị 3 cháu vẫn đang học phổ thông nên chi phí khá tốn kém. Để có tiền cho các con ăn học, ngoài làm ruộng, chị Tình còn chăn nuôi kết hợp với việc buôn bán. Tiền vay từ Quỹ được chị chia làm hai phần, một phần mua lợn bò, một phần dùng cho việc bán rau quả, hàng khô ngoài chợ. Nhờ sử dụng vốn vay hợp lý nên việc trả tiền tuần của chị Tình luôn thuận lợi. Số tiền bán lợn, bò được dùng đóng học phí cho các con hoặc sắm sửa vật dụng trong nhà. Kinh tế qua các năm có nhiều thay đổi, chị Tình tiếp tục xin vay 575USD để mua lợn và hàng bán.

loans.use: Buy pigs and goods

loans.name: Nubia Raquel

texts.es:
In the town of Five Pines in Chinandega city, Mrs. Nubia G. works selling clothing out of her home. She is the mother of two children (a girl and a boy). She is very proud of her kids, as they are excellent students.

Mrs. Nubia G. has begun renovating her house. Yet due to the low income she generates from selling clothes she doesn't have the resources to continue with the renovation. For this reason she seeks support from Ceprodel. She aims to buy construction materials with the loan she receives. This way she will be able to finish what she started and provide her kids and family with a decent place to live.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

En el municipio de Cinco Pinos de la ciudad de Chinandega, la señora Nubia G. se dedica al negocio de la venta de ropa en su casa de habitación. Es madre de dos pequeños (un niño y una niña) los cuales se siente muy orgullosa debido a que son excelentes alumnos.

Actualmente la señora Nubia G. ha iniciado la reconstrucción de su casa de habitación habiendo invertido en el inicio de esta actividad pero a pesar de sus bajos ingresos económicos que percibe de la venta de ropa no logra obtener los suficientes recursos para continuar con la reconstrucción. Es por esta razón que busca apoyo crediticio en Ceprodel con el propósito de obtener recursos económicos para la compra de los materiales de construcción y así terminar la actividad que comenzó para brindarle a sus hijos y familiares un techo digno donde vivir.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials

loans.name: Norma Rudis

texts.es:
Mrs. Norma Rudis G. P. is a single mother of 4 children and is responsible for them all. Her youngest son is in college. Therefore Norma sees it as her implicit duty to make sure that her son continues his education. For 15 years she has been making and selling bread out of her home which is located in Five Pines village in the city of Chinandega.

Ever since she started her business Norma has tried to provide her family with all that they need. She has the responsibility of maintaining her business by purchasing all the products she needs to stock her store. For this reason she seeks support from Ceprodel. With the loan she plans on getting raw materials to make bread so that she can support her family and her son's academic pursuits.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

La señora Norma Rudis G. P. es una madre soltera con 4 hijos a su responsabilidad de los cuales su hijo menor estudia en la universidad y por ende ella tiene la implícita obligación de mantener sus estudios. Desde hace 15 años ella se dedica al negocio de elaboración y venta de pan en su casa de habitación que cita en el municipio de Cinco Pinos de la ciudad de Chinandega.

Desde que ella inició en este negocio se ha venido esforzando logrando brindar las condiciones necesarias de vida a su familia. Actualmente una de las necesidades que ella posee es la de obtener recursos económicos para la compra de productos para abastecer su panadería y es por esto que ella busca apoyo en Ceprodel para ser financiada con crédito que le den lugar a la adquisición de la materia prima y así poder seguir manteniendo su núcleo familiar y los estudios de su hijo.

loans.use: Compra de materia prima para elaboracion de pan

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị M., 45 years old, 4th year member of the TYM Fund, is married and has 6 children. She raises livestock and does business. She utilizes loans wisely and efficiently. The monthly family’s income is 200USD. She would like to apply for a loan of 450USD to buy piglets and to invest in her business. She wishes that she can remain her membership with Fund 10 or 15 more years.

Translated from Vietnamese by ngungo, Kiva volunteer.


Chị Nguyễn Thị M., 45 tuổi, là thành viên năm thứ 4 của Quỹ Tình thương. Gia đình chị gồm 2 vợ chồng và 6 người con. Công việc chính của chị hiện nay là chăn nuôi và buôn bán. Các vòng vốn vay trước chị đều sử dụng đúng mục đích và hiệu quả. Thu nhập hàng tháng của gia đình là 200USD/tháng. Thấy việc sử dụng vốn thuận lợi chị M. tiếp tục xin vay 450USD để mua lợn và buôn bán. Mong muốn của chị là sẽ tham gia Quỹ từ 10-15 năm nữa.

loans.use: Buy piglets and goods

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị Lý, 48 years old, raises livestock and does business for living. She uses funs from the loans from the TYM Fund to finance her livestock and businesses. Different from typical banks, the TYM Fund makes loans with easy payment terms. She increases the loan amounts gradualL.. The famiL.’s economy becomes better, that allows her to buy few appliances for her home. This time, she is taking out a loan of 450USD to buy piglets. The current famiL.’s income is 200USD.

Translated from Vietnamese by ngungo, Kiva volunteer.


Chị Nguyễn Thị Lý, 48 tuổi, sinh sống bằng việc chăn nuôi lợn, bò và buôn bán. Nguồn vốn đầu tư cho dự án được chị vay từ Quỹ Tình thương. Không giống như nguồn vốn của Ngân hàng và các tổ chức tín dụng khác, Quỹ Tình thương cho vay vốn trả dần. Sau một thời gian tham gia, nhận thấy cơ chế hoạt động rất phù hợp với gia đình nên chị Lý dần mạnh dạn vay các mức vốn lớn. Kinh tế gia đình phát triển đời sống được nâng lên, chị Lý có điều kiện sắm sửa thêm các vật dụng sinh hoạt trong nhà. Vòng vốn này chị tiếp tục xin vay 450USD mua lợn giống. Thu nhập hiện tại của gia đình là 200USD/tháng.

loans.use: Buy pigs

loans.name: Pham Thi

texts.vi:
Mrs. Phạm Thị Đình, 43 years old, lives with her husband and 5 children in Hưng Nguyên, Nghệ An. She joins the TYM Fund 4 years ago. All the funds from the loans that she took out she invested in her grocery store. The business is convenient for the weekly payments and she has never been late on any payment. The incomes seem proportional to the loan amounts. She is applying for a loan of 650USD. Her current monthly income is 200-220USD.

Translated from Vietnamese by ngungo, Kiva volunteer.


Chị Phạm Thị Đình, 43 tuổi, sống cùng chồng và 5 người con tại Hưng Nguyên, Nghệ An. Chị đã tham gia vào Quỹ được 4 năm. Các vòng vốn trước chị Đình đều vay vốn đầu tư vào bán hàng tạp hóa. Đây là một công việc thuận tiện cho việc hoàn trả tuần. Trong suốt thời gian tham gia chưa bao giờ chị Đình chậm trễ trong việc hoàn trả. Những lúc hàng bán chạy, thu nhập từ cửa hàng thường tỷ lệ thuận với mức vốn đầu tư. Chị Đình vừa làm đơn xin vay mức vốn 650USD để mua thêm hàng bán. Thu nhập hiện nay của cửa hàng là 200-220USD/tháng.

loans.use: Buy goods for her grocery store

loans.name: Le Thi

texts.vi:
Mrs. Lê Thị Hạnh, 50 years old, is a cadre of the village’s women association and also a member of the TYM Fund since 1996. In 9 years, she invested all the funds from her loans to her refreshment stand that she had at her house. The income was adequate. In 2005, she changes her business to selling fertilizer and raising cattle. The income increases significantly to 8USD a day. Her 4 children are all grown up and have jobs at the Agriculture Center of Nội Bài. They help their mother to make the payments when she is in need. With a good plan, she is applying for a loan of 1200USD to buy feed and juvenile fish.

Translated from Vietnamese by ngungo, Kiva volunteer.


Chị Lê Thị Hạnh, 50 tuổi, là cán bộ Hội phụ nữ xã và là thành viên Quỹ TYM năm 1996. Trong 9 năm vay vốn chị Hạnh đầu tư vào bán hàng giải khát tại nhà, thu nhập cũng tương đối ổn định. Năm 2005 chị chuyển sang kinh doanh phân bón, chăn nuôi bò sinh sản, thả cá. Thu nhập tăng lên rõ rệt, bình quân mỗi ngày 8USD. 4 người con của chị Hạnh đều đã trưởng thành và đi làm công nhân khu công nghiệp Nội Bài nên hỗ trợ mẹ rất nhiều trong việc hoàn trả vốn vay khi có khó khăn. Dự án đang phát triển tốt, vòng vốn này chị Hạnh xin vay 1200USD mua thức ăn chăn nuôi và cá giống.

loans.use: Buy feed and juvenile fish

loans.name: Ngo Thi

texts.vi:
Mrs Ngô Thị Kỷ is 39 years old. She joined TYM fund in 2000. She had a rice husking business, the waste bran & husk were used to feed her pigs. After a year of success, she started investing in pig farming. She had high hope for this business. She built new pig pen and also a biogas installation. She also sells vegetables. Her family income is 200-300 USD a month. Today, there are 27 pigs in her stable each weighing 30 kg. This time she requests a loan of 1200 USD to buy breeding pigs and mash. She also has plan to convert part of her land to raise egg laying chickens. Mrs Kỷ lives in Sóc Sơn with her husband and their 2 children.

Translated from Vietnamese by Khang Ho-Si, Kiva volunteer.

Tham gia Quỹ năm 2000 chị Ngô Thị Kỷ, 39 tuổi, vay vốn buôn bán thóc gạo, tận dụng cám nuôi lợn. Sau năm đầu làm ăn hiệu quả, các vòng vốn sau chị vay mức cao nhất đầu tư chăn nuôi lợn với qui mô lớn. Chị Kỷ tiến hành xây dựng chuồng trại, bể bioga. Bên cạnh đó chị Kỷ còn bán thực phẩm tươi sống tại trung tâm thôn. Mức thu nhập bình quân của gia đình chị hàng tháng khoảng 200-300USD. Hiện tại trong chuồng nhà chị có 27 con lợn thịt, mỗi con khoảng 30kg. Vòng vốn này chị Kỷ xin vay 1200USD mua thêm lợn giống và thức ăn gia súc. Chị cũng đang có dự định cải tạo vườn tạp xây dựng chuồng trại chăn nuôi gà đẻ. Chị Kỷ hiện đang sống cùng chồng và 2 con tại Sóc Sơn.

loans.use: Buy pigs and mash.

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Mrs Nguyễn Thị Họa, 54, joined TYM fund in 1996. Her first loan was only 50 USD. After dicussing with her husband, she used the loan to buy ducks and breeding chickens. She was successful in her business so her family living condition improved. She was able to provide for her 6 children. Today, all her children are grown up and they have stable jobs. She has water buffaloes that she would rent to other farmers to plow their field. Her husband is in charge of this operation. Her family income is 300-350 USD a month. This time she request a loan of 1200 USD to buy chickens and ducks to expand her farming business. Her youngest son is a taxi driver in Ha Noi. In the feature, she wishes to get a loan so that she would be able to help her son get his own car.

Translated from Vietnamese by Khang Ho-Si, Kiva volunteer.

Chị Nguyễn Thị Họa, 54 tuổi, vào Quỹ năm 1996. Vòng vốn đầu tiên được vay 50USD chị bàn với chồng mua vịt, gà giống siêu trứng. Công việc chăn nuôi rất thuận lợi nên kinh tế gia đình phát triển tốt, chị Họa có điều kiện chăm lo con cái trưởng thành. Đến nay 6 người con của chị đều có công việc ổn định. Hiện tại chị còn nuôi bò cày cày thuê cho bà con trong thôn. Công việc này do anh Đắc, chồng chị, đảm nhiệm nên hỗ trợ rất nhiều cho chị trong việc hoàn trả tuần. Thu nhập của cả gia đình từ 300-330USD/tháng. Vòng vốn này chị Họa xin vay 1200USD để mua thêm gà vịt mở rộng qui mô chăn nuôi. Con trai út chị Họa đang lái xe tắc xi Nội Bài vì thế chị trong tương lai chị luôn mong muốn Quỹ cho vay những mức vốn lớn để mua xe ô tô cho con lái.

loans.use: Buy chickens, ducks

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
In 1996 when TYM fund opened a branch in Quang Tiến, Mrs Nguyễn Thị K. was on of the first woman to joined TYM. Mrs K. is 39 years old, she used her first loan (50 USD) to invest in pig raising. After a few rounds, she became familiar with the procedure so she applied for max loan in later rounds. She invested all her loans in farming pigs, ducks and chickens. Her husband is a construction worker, he is very supportive of her. He helps her make the weekly payment whenever she is short. In 2001, Mrs K. converted her rice field into a fish farm. Today, her family's farm has an area of 8/10 acre. There are 200 egg laying ducks, 11 pigs, 2 cows and a fish pond of 5/10 acre. Her family income is 250-300 USD a month. Mrs K. is requesting a loan of 1200 USD to buy feed for her animals and fishes.

Translated from Vietnamese by Khang Ho-Si, Kiva volunteer.

Năm 1996, khi Quỹ Tình thương về với xã Quang Tiến, chị Nguyễn Thị K., 39 tuổi, là một trong những thành viên đầu tiên tham gia. Số tiền 50USD của vòng vốn đầu tiên được chị đầu tư cho chăn nuôi. Sau khi làm quen với cách cho vay của Quỹ, các vòng vốn tiếp theo chị vay mức tối đa tiếp tục chăn nuôi lợn gà vịt. Chồng chị, một thợ xây, luôn giúp đỡ vợ trong công việc và hỗ trợ tiền trả tuần khi chị có khó khăn. Năm 2001 chị K. đổi ruộng làm kinh tế trang trại vườn cây ao cá. Hiện nay trang trại của gia đình có diện tích 8 sào với trên 200 con vịt đẻ trứng, 11 con lợn thịt, 2 con bò và trên 5 sào ao cá. Bình quân thu nhập của gia đình 250-300USD/tháng. Chị K. dự định vay thêm 1200USD đầu tư thêm vào trang trại.(mua cá giống, thức ăn gia súc)

loans.use: Buy fishes, food for pigs, ducks

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en:
Luisa is in her early forties. She and her husband have five children, two of them boys, all of whom go to school.

A few months ago, Luisa took a loan from FSMA, which she invested in her husband's business. He sells sweets and candies, and that activity is the principal source of income for the family. The couple used their loan intelligently and they managed to move the business forward and increase the family’s revenue.
